thread.title: Nunes offers heartfelt apology to Ronda Rousey
thread.title_full: Nunes offers heartfelt apology to Ronda Rousey

title: Nunes offers heartfelt apology to Ronda Rousey
text:
Nunes offers heartfelt apology to Ronda Rousey A classy apology. Post to Facebook Nunes offers heartfelt apology to Ronda Rousey A classy apology.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/amanda-nunes-apology-ufc-207-ronda-rousey-retirement-mma/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Nunes offers heartfelt apology to Ronda Rousey Andrew Joseph 8:32 p.m. ET Jan. 31, 2017 
Amanda Nunes (right) hugs Ronda Rousey following their fight during UFC 207 at T-Mobile Arena. (Photo: Mark J. Rebilas-USA TODAY Sports) 
Amanda Nunes thoroughly dominated Ronda Rousey at UFC 207 - Rousey's first fight since November 2015. 
After the 48-second fight, Nunes fired off on Rousey and mocked her again on Twitter . On Tuesday, Nunes offered a sincere apology one month after the dominant performance. 
She posted to Instagram: A photo posted by Amandaü¶ÅNunes (@amanda_leoa) on Jan 31, 2017 at 12:52pm PST 
Let me take a moment to explain myself. I was overwhelmed with adrenaline, emotion and hurt at the time. I held so much in during the weeks prior to my fight with Ronda. I might have said or posted some things at the time that I now realize was not the right thing to do. I want to apologize to Ronda. Her fans and mine and the UFC as well. Ronda is an amazing athlete and has done so much for this sport, especially for the women. #respect 
On Monday, Dana White suggested that Rousey's career was probably over . Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/amanda-nunes-apology-ufc-207-ronda-rousey-retirement-mma/ Most Popular
